title.rendered: Air Arabia repatriation flights from Sharjah to Egypt, Iran during COVID 19 Situation

content.rendered:
Air Arabia special repatriation flights from Sharjah to Egypt from 11 th June

Air Arabia operates special outbound flights to repatriate people who are residing in the UAE back to their home country.

Destination Date Departure Arrival
Cairo (1st daily flight) 11 June – 16 June 13:00 14:50
Cairo (2nd daily flight) 11 June – 16 June 22:20 00:10
Sohag 12 June – 16 June 11:00 12:30
Alexandria 11 June – 16 June

12 June – 14 June

15 June

16 June

 21:40

07:00

18:25

19:15

 23:25

08:45

20:10

21:00

Bookings can be done as a one way reservation through website, contact center or partner travel agents. Passengers holding a credit voucher can utilize their credit as a payment towards the new booking by calling our contact center on (06) 558 0000.

Terms and Conditions

  1. This flight is outbound only and reserved for Egyptian nationals residing in the UAE.
  2. Passengers must wear medical masks and gloves at the airport, onboard the plane and in transit.
  3. Passengers must arrive at the airport 4 hours prior to departure.
  4. No penalty will apply in case of flight modification or cancellation.

Air Arabia special repatriation flights from Sharjah to Iran from 11 th June

Destination Date Departure Arrival
Lar 11 June 13:00 14:30

Bookings can be done as a one way reservation through website, contact center or partner travel agents. Passengers holding a credit voucher can utilize their credit as a payment towards the new booking by calling our contact center on (06) 558 0000.

Terms and Conditions

  1. This flight is outbound only and reserved for Iranian nationals residing in the UAE.
  2. Passengers must arrive at the airport four hours prior to departure.
  3. Passengers must wear medical masks and gloves at the airport, onboard the plane and in transit.
  4. Flights are subject to approval from the authorities and passenger load. In case a flight is cancelled, passengers would be provided credit voucher of the full paid amount.
